EvdFileOffset.Wiki: Offset from the default EMEVD file

MapFile.Wiki: Map Id the boss is located in

WarpPointId.Wiki: Region to teleport the player to

EnemyNameAndImage.Wiki: Visual and Text display for the boss in the menu
